amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 as en bloc No. 8: Nos. 239, 240, 243, 246, 247, 249, 255, 257, 259, 263, 265, and 274.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (NC) amendments (A081) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A081) offered by Mr. Price (NC).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Price (NC) amendments (A081) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A081) offered by Mr. Price (NC).
